EmailTemplate.description: This template can be used to notify users of a failure in the UPTIQ AI Document Rule Validation Agent with exception details
EmailTemplate.name: Uptiq AI Agent Failure Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: UPTIQ Agent Processing Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
This is to inform you that the UPTIQ AI Document Rule Validation Agent encountered a failure during processing.
If you are unsure how to interpret this message, please reach out to the assistance team for support.
Best regards, FullSkope Team
